ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.

Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned a great deal about the current situation in Afghanistan, how the international system works, and real world politics.
Issues surrounding the talibans oppression of women

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: This course felt very lax compared to other senior capstones. Whereas other capstones got to fly internationally and really engage with stakeholders, ours did not.
Great course, important to stress that you are writing a paper FOR a client

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! The idea of a senior capstone overall is very intriguing and captivating.
Yes definitely - very interesting, relevant, and extremely important material and learning

Yes! Professor Worden is extremely knowledgable on the topic, gives students ample opportunities to engage with the material, and encourages a classroom environment welcoming different opinions and student collaboration.
